prompts: Create a cute camel-like Pokemon that thrives in desert environments.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon with a yellow body and green accents.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a friendly desert creature with a sunny personality.
Design a Pokemon that has a soft, rounded body and a laid-back demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique blend of yellow and green colors, perfect for sandy habitats.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it could be a companion while exploring arid landscapes.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of warmth and resilience in harsh environments.
